# custom_config.py
from ydata_profiling.config import Settings

custom_config = Settings()

# Turn off detailed per-variable stats
custom_config.vars.cat.length = False
custom_config.vars.cat.characters = False
custom_config.vars.cat.words = False

custom_config.vars.text.length = False
custom_config.vars.text.characters = False
custom_config.vars.text.words = False

# Turn off interaction plots
custom_config.interactions.continuous = False

# Turn off missing value matrix
# Example of setting missing diagram options correctly
custom_config.missing_diagrams['matrix'] = False

# Simplify HTML output
custom_config.html.minify_html = True

# Turn off the progress bar
custom_config.progress_bar = False

# customized settings for tickets
